programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: On todays programme we are catching up with the fennec fox kits that were born last summer. Named Dot and Other, they are the first fennec fox babies to make it this far, thanks to the incredible efforts of the keepers hand-rearing them.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: We see the culmination of a five year project in Cheshire, but will a couple be able to create their dream home? Martin meets a first-time developer in east London who has an inspiring attitude. Jacqui is fighting against overgrown shrubbery.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Yule love this seasonal episode of the show, with a sackful of profits and Christmas cheer, co-presented by Danny Sebastian and Elfred the naughty elf.

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Sister Boniface is stranded on a snowbound train. When a precious jewel is stolen from its safe and a passenger is discovered murdered, she must use her exceptional detection skills to decide who among the suspects is responsible.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Three generations of the same family need help from Jules Hudson to find them a new, rural Norfolk home. In the kitty is £800,000 for a four-bedroom house, an annexe for Granny and enough land for a Shetland pony. Jules also needs a keen eye to spot some of the worlds rarest species of deer and antelope at a local safari park.

programme.title: Pointless Celebrities
programme.desc: A celebrity edition of the general knowledge quiz in which four teams try to come up with the answers that no-one else could think of. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and co-host Richard Osman, with contestants Jamie Laing, James Argent, Griff Rhys Jones, Nina Wadia, Lee Latchford Evans, Claire Richards, Sindhu Vee and Tiff Stevenson.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Layton Williams, Emma Barton, Mark Pougatch, Karenjeet Kaur Bains and Dr Punam Krishan race in moving podiums in a festive episode of the quiz to try to win £5,000 for their chosen charity.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Lauren faces the music for her actions, Zoe helps an unlikely Walford resident, and Julie makes a decision.

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: The time has come for the culmination of five weeks of competition between 15 showbiz stars, who are now down to the strongest three as they face off for the title. One will be crowned Celebrity MasterChef Champion 2025. The journey so far has seen them deliver some outstanding creations, worthy of a place on any professional chefs menu, so the chances are that we are in for a night of outstanding cookery. Each celebrity must prepare a three-course meal.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop are joined by a variety of guest hosts and panellists from the worlds of comedy, journalism and current affairs for a compilation that looks back at the big news of 2025.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon is back in the hosts chair for a festive edition of the award-winning comedy panel show. And as ever, David Mitchell and Lee Mack are the lightning-quick team captains. Over the course of the show, a stellar cast of celebrity guests reveal amazing stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up? David Mitchell is joined by Jimmy Carr and Laura Smyth. Lee Macks fellow panellists are Rustie Lee and Lenny Rush.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live

Drinks expert Olly Smith pairs the wines to go with the studio dishes, and Carmen ONeal is here to make some festive cocktails. There are also more great moments from the BBC food archive.

programme.title: Nigella: At My Table
programme.desc: Nigella decamps to the countryside for a cosy Christmas. She throws a party, serving platters of devilled eggs and a sparkling cocktail, and creates a feast of roast duck with orange, soy and ginger alongside garlic and parmesan mashed potato gratin and sour-sweet soused red cabbage with cranberries.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Fasten your seat belts and get ready for take-off as Bargain Hunt celebrates the worlds first supersonic airliner. When it launched in 1976, Concorde was the height of innovative design and luxury, whisking passengers across the Atlantic in as little as three hours. Eric Knowles boards the last Concorde to be built and reminisces about its three decades of aviation history, including the à la carte menu and the seats designed by Terence Conran.

programme.title: Hamza: Strictly Birds of Prey
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Hamza Yassin travels across the UK to attempt to film his favourite birds. His journey takes him from the wilds of Scotland to the heart of Ealing, and along the way he meets a host of friends, conservationists and filmmakers.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Upon learning that the museums magic is disappearing, night watchman Larry Daley sets out on an epic quest to the British Museum in London to save his friends one last time.

programme.title: Lifeline

programme.title: Impossible

programme.title: Brainbox Challenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson hosts a brain training quiz show in which contestants battle to prove themselves in a sequence of brain games which test their memory, language, visual, numerical and spacial skills.

programme.title: The Polar Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan and the team return to Svalbard in mid-June on the trail of Lyra and her cubs Miki and Luca. Gordon works with scientists to try to understand how his polar bear family are surviving the unusual arctic weather. He finds Lyra and renews his bond with her, but discovers that cub Luca is missing. Lyra is devoted to her remaining cub Miki, but his future is also uncertain.

programme.title: Beechgrove
programme.desc: Jackie Fry has lovingly renovated two acres of previously overgrown land in Gifford on the edge of the Lammermuirs. Jackie and her husband were hit by a snowstorm which made them realise that their garden would have to be filled with hardy plants.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcocks classic about two men who plot a perfect murder. When tennis pro Guy Haines meets smooth-talking Bruno Antony in the bar car of a train, he finds the stranger sympathetic with his desire to be rid of his clinging wife. The sinister Bruno then proposes that they swap murders: Bruno will murder Guys wife, and Guy will do away with Brunos father.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Haddon Hall in Derbyshire, where he is joined by experts Michael Baggot and Caroline Hawley. Together the team pick out a selection of interesting antiques and collectables to be sold at a local auction. Michael finds a glorious scent bottle, but will he come out of it smelling of roses? Caroline gets a glimpse into the past by looking through a stereoscopic viewer.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Sitting on the east coast of Jersey, and about 14 miles from the coast of Normandy, the small village of Gorey was, for hundreds of years the frontline of defence between the British Isles and its enemy, the French. Archaeologist Ben Robinson follows the story of this small villages history as an important military location, from the castle built in the 1200s to the experiences of the village in the second world war when occupied by Hitlers army.

programme.title: Kindig Customs

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As a polar vortex storm slams the Cornelia Marie in the far north, Josh navigates the biggest seas of his career while Casey performs emergency surgery.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fishing crews on the Bering Sea endure mortal peril and intense discomfort during crab season, with 12-metre waves, 318-kilogram crab pots that can easily crush a careless crewman, and freezing temperatures around the clock.

programme.title: Buying Alaska
programme.desc: In the small fishing village of Haines, Harry and Genny are looking to move away from their smelly neighbour - Harrys fish cannery business.

programme.title: Buying Alaska
programme.desc: A couple with a budget of $350,000 search for a home in Juneau where their toddler can have more space.

programme.title: Ed Stafford: Left for Dead
programme.desc: Ed is in the worlds highest, driest desert in Bolivias isolated high plains. He must navigate his way to safety through perilous canyons in the blazing heat.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Using their own 40-acre homestead, the Raneys reveal the five essential watchouts for wanna-be homesteaders seeking land to settle on.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: During a wild, unprecedented year, the Raneys visit a homestead they helped save more than three years ago and check in with other homesteads that have flourished in the months since the Raneys rescue.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Ant Anstead work together to give new life to run-down classic automobiles to resell them at a profit. Working on a tight budget, Mike must find a vehicle for Ant to fix, but that isnt always the easiest task.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Bigfoot Took Her
programme.desc: The search for Theresa takes a dramatic turn, and an unsuspecting familys home becomes a potential crime scene; while new evidence emerges that could change the entire case, a final witness steps forward with heartbreaking new details.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Phil and Heather travel to the location of the original Conjuring House to investigate a familys claims that similar dark paranormal activity is haunting their home. Could the Warrens unfinished business be terrorising another family?

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: The hunt for El Dorado is Joshs most grueling journey ever and one of the crew tumbles into a raging river. When cutting-edge aerial scans reveal a lost city, they push into the jungle to uncover El Dorado and the gold that comes with it.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: When Josh devises a formula for a profitable hard seltzer, he must convince Tickle and the Laws to contribute their valuable peach brandy to a risky enterprise. Mark and Digger attempt to turn a windfall of scuppernong grapes into Appalachian cognac.

programme.title: Gold Divers

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

Can Gordon wrangle these hapless proprietors and stubborn employees back into one productive team and save the restaurant?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to hide his friendship with Penny from Leonard but it isnt long before his double life is exposed to Penny and Leonard. Can Penny and Leonard keep their friendships with Sheldon without hurting each other?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

This means our four heroes arent involved - or at least not until the last minute when Carlis desperate, but their help proves to be a bigger hindrance than anyone could have imagined.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Having gone to Claudia and Stuarts wedding alone, Ted meets the girl of his dreams but doesnt get her name. He does everything he can to try and find her, but without her proper name its beginning to look like hell never see her again.

They even put up their houses as collateral! Unfortunately, soon Charlies was in trouble.

programme.desc: Sheldon begrudgingly takes care of Amy when she is sick, but she loves the extra attention so much that she is still pretending to be ill long after her recovery is complete. Bernadette arranges for Howard to go on a fishing trip with her macho father, hoping that they will bond.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj and Lucy have their first date meeting in a library and texting to each other and the guys have to promote science careers for women at Howards old middle school, while the girls go to Disneyland.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: On his deathbed, King Henry VIII recalls how he wooed and wed his six wives - and disposed of five of them - in a bid to secure the succession to the throne with a male heir. Despite his many marriages and the crowded Court, Henry remains essentially lonely.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: A portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, beginning with his initially successful exploits in the North African desert until his defeat by Montgomery. Returning to Berlin, he becomes involved with Colonel Von Stauffenbergs plot to assassinate Hitler - but when the dictator escapes the bomb and the conspirators are rounded up, Rommel, because of his high standing with the German public, is offered the choice of suicide.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony contemplates the future of the HUD partnership, Paulie blows off steam with an old pal, and Janice begins to lose patience with Bobby.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned deals with all sorts of new issues while King Robert goes hunting, and Tyrion must stand trial at the Eyrie for his alleged crimes.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At his familys war camp, Lord Tywin Lannister butchers a stag and discusses their houses situation with his son Jaime Lannister, who reads Lord Ned Starks order for Tywin to appear at court. The patriarch reprimands his son for attacking Ned in the streets and explains how important it is to free Tyrion from the Eyrie: `Every day that he remains a prisoner, the less our name commands respect.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The saga of a fictional, American global-media family that is not only rich and powerful but also powerfully dysfunctional.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Artie makes a loan to his new hostesss brother for an overseas business venture; Chris gets new responsibilities; Carmela fixes up Furio with a date; Anthony Jr. has a new girlfriend.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: After Paulie gets released from jail, Tony and the gang throw him a Bada Bing bash; the new family financial adviser nixes a scheme; Adriana presses Christopher about marriage.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: After the capture of Ned, Syrio and Arya confront Lannister guards whilst Cersei uses all the power of manipulation on Sansa.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In the black cells of the Red Keep, Lord Ned Stark wastes away in the darkness. Lord Varys visits the accused traitor to say that his own loyalties are to the people of the realm. Varys wants to avoid the way that Robb Stark is about to wage against the Lannisters, and all devastation it will cause to innocent lives. Ned refuses to offer a false confession and capitulate to the queen who tried to murder his son.

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Years after suffering a tragedy, a chance encounter with a young Milo leads Carrie to fixate on the boy; her obsession takes a dark turn while planning the kidnapping, forcing her to ask for help when things go awry, with deadly consequences.

programme.title: The Staircase
programme.desc: In 2001, Kathleen prepares for a Christmas to remember. Years later, Sophie continues her quest to prove Michaels innocence.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: Draculas spell turns a woman and her loved ones into a vampire, a mummy, a werewolf and Frankensteins monster.

programme.title: Monster Family 2
programme.desc: Baba Yaga and Renfield are captured by a monster hunter so the Wishbone family once again transform into a vampire Frankensteins monster a mummy and a werewolf in a bid to free them.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Mirandas Victim
programme.desc: In 1963, 18-year-old Patricia Weir is kidnapped and brutally raped. Committed to putting her attacker, Ernesto Miranda, in prison, Trishs life is destroyed by Americas legal system as she triggers a law that transforms the nation.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The Spy Kids set off on their third adventure. Secret Agent Carmen finds herself trapped in a 3-D virtual reality video game designed by their new arch nemesis, the Toymaker. Juni must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda is a gifted child, more gifted than any other, but her parents wont let her go to school. She teaches herself for years by going to the library and reading everything she sees. Eventually she convinces her parents to let her go to school, but discovers her special talents are needed to protect the school and her lovely teacher from the evil headmistress.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie and a living woman sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When Yang, his adopted daughters beloved android, suddenly malfunctions, a father searches way to repair him. In the process, he discovers that life has been passing in front of him and he has drifted away from his family.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk

programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl presents a department-store Santa with an odd request: reunite her divorced parents before her mother remarries.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.desc: Santa Clauss wish comes true when he accidentally bumps his head and starts believing hes SuperKlaus. With the help of Billie and Leo his elf-xecutive assistant, SuperKlaus will take on a toy-obsessed businessman to save Christmas.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: A Sudden Case of Christmas
programme.desc: A couple bring their young daughter, Claire, to her grandfathers hotel in Italy to tell her that they are separating. Hoping to bring them back together, Claire asks the entire family to spend one last Christmas together, even though its August.

programme.desc: A couple bring their young daughter, Claire, to her grandfathers hotel in Italy to tell her that they are separating. Hoping to bring them back together, Claire asks the entire family to spend one last Christmas together, even though its August.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Grinch

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Santa gives a successful businessman 12 chances to relive the same day so he can repair his damaged relationships with his loved ones.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves! Where is Hopparoo? Only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but when they decide to surprise everybody else in town too Hopparoo is not impressed. In their efforts to surprise the bunny, they give the Spring Chicks such a fright that they barricade themselves in front of the clockhouse, blocking the way to Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is teaching the twins pottery, and to inspire them she shows them a magnificent cow pot that she made on her wheel, but when she leaves them to their enthusiastic pot-making, they accidentally smash it and when they try to repair it, they only make things worse. Trying to re-create the pot is even more of a disaster. Huge quantities of clay fly from their wheel into the town, blocking Puffertys tracks.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Great Rains
programme.desc: The savannah animals are busy preparing for the great rains, which are due any day. The rains flood the plains every year and they will have to take shelter on Blue Mountain. This year it is Giggles and Tickles turn to keep watch for the start of the rain.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nelson is in an inventive mood, and agrees to make various objects for his friends. Alan the aardvark is excited about the scooter that Nelson is making him - even though he doesnt really know what a scooter is. The other animals all take it in turns to help deliver the scooter to Alan, each making their own modifications to the vehicle on the way. Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Reginalds New Look
programme.desc: Nathalie the antelope decides to give Reginald the lion a makeover to refresh his look. She restyles him to such an extent that none of the other animals recognise him when he tries to alert them of an imminent danger. Will Reginald be able to lead his friends to safety in time?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: It is Washi-Washi day in the So Hi Mountains, when all the animals wash and groom themselves until they are squeaky and clean. While all the other animals are having fun getting clean, Horace the hare keeps making excuses not to join in. Can Horaces friends persuade him that bathing can be great fun?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Last Buluru Berry
programme.desc: Joey and his friends are excited when they come across a bush full of delicious smelling buluru berries. Wally Two Trees warns them that they must leave the berries on the bush until they are all ripe, when there will be a grand tasting, but berries keep disappearing off the bush.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Muellers gibbons Adidas and Dalumie head for the treetops for the first time, while Peanut, Pung-Yo and Tien, the endangered golden-cheeked gibbons, move into the enclosure next door. Plus, a specialist doctor is called in when Freddys bowel complaint fails to improve.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison Cronin travels to Monkey Worlds new endangered primate sanctuary in Vietnam, and meets the newest resident of the centre, Ellie the young golden-cheeked gibbon. Meanwhile, the team learn that two rare monkeys are being kept in a theme park outside Ho Chi Minh City, and attempt to get them freed.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Stump-tailed macaque Jonathan has to get some sun cream, as the high-ranking members of the troop have over groomed him and he has gone bald. Meanwhile, the park is saddened by the death of alpha male capuchin Tom, who was at the centre for seven years. Elsewhere, the chimps are given walnuts and Jestah gets more than his fair share.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Disturbing footage convinces Alison to rescue an adult female chimpanzee working in the tourist industry in Mexico, who urgently needs the teams help. Elsewhere, even Lulu joins in the fun when the nursery chimps have a play session, and Kai tries to act independent and grown up while discouraging Amy from joining in his games.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: An examination of the 80 mammal species, 650 bird species, 50 reptile species and more than 300 fish species that inhabit the Pantanal.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The crucial ecological roles that beetles play in nearly every environment, and why they are often regarded "the most important species on the planet."

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough follows baby animals as they communicate in their quest for survival, using sound to beg and call for help in the vulnerable early days of life in the natural world.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.sub-title: Indonesia: The Secret Life of Manta Rays
programme.desc: The remote islands of Raja Ampat in the Indonesian archipelago are home to a diversity of marine life, including the secretive giants of the ocean, manta rays. A team of researchers from Conservation International heads out on an expedition to learn more about the biology, population size and migration patterns of these astonishing animals to protect them from overfishing outside of marine-protected areas.

programme.desc: Nunavik is bigger than California and is a pristine wilderness of water, forest, and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Land of the Far North
programme.desc: This documentary shows the wonderful polar world of northern Scandinavia. In summer, the sun barely sets. Despite an abundance of food, plants and animals face many challenges.

programme.title: Land of the Far North
programme.desc: Despite the darkness and cold at the Arctic Circle, plants and animals manage to survive.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Welcome to the shores Canadas Hudson Bay, where a unique community polar bears are battling to survive in a rapidly changing landscape.

programme.title: Wild Dogs
programme.desc: Discover the ways in which natural selection and human pressure have shaped the raccoon dog, the golden jackal and the maned wolf.

programme.title: Africas Underwater Wonders
programme.desc: In one of Africas greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolutions most magnificent display. This episode tells the story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as showing how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: A biologist searches for a giant otter den at the southern edge of the Brazilian Pantanal.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains
programme.desc: One of the most majestic, unspoiled and rarely filmed areas in Africa is an exploration of how wildlife including cheetahs, hyenas and elephants survive the cycles of draught and rainfall.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Muellers gibbons Adidas and Dalumie head for the treetops for the first time, while Peanut, Pung-Yo and Tien, the endangered golden-cheeked gibbons, move into the enclosure next door. Plus, a specialist doctor is called in when Freddys bowel complaint fails to improve.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison Cronin travels to Monkey Worlds new endangered primate sanctuary in Vietnam, and meets the newest resident of the centre, Ellie the young golden-cheeked gibbon. Meanwhile, the team learn that two rare monkeys are being kept in a theme park outside Ho Chi Minh City, and attempt to get them freed.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Stump-tailed macaque Jonathan has to get some sun cream, as the high-ranking members of the troop have over groomed him and he has gone bald. Meanwhile, the park is saddened by the death of alpha male capuchin Tom, who was at the centre for seven years. Elsewhere, the chimps are given walnuts and Jestah gets more than his fair share.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Disturbing footage convinces Alison to rescue an adult female chimpanzee working in the tourist industry in Mexico, who urgently needs the teams help. Elsewhere, even Lulu joins in the fun when the nursery chimps have a play session, and Kai tries to act independent and grown up while discouraging Amy from joining in his games.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: An examination of the 80 mammal species, 650 bird species, 50 reptile species and more than 300 fish species that inhabit the Pantanal.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World
programme.desc: The crucial ecological roles that beetles play in nearly every environment, and why they are often regarded "the most important species on the planet."

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough follows baby animals as they communicate in their quest for survival, using sound to beg and call for help in the vulnerable early days of life in the natural world.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild
programme.sub-title: Indonesia: The Secret Life of Manta Rays
programme.desc: The remote islands of Raja Ampat in the Indonesian archipelago are home to a diversity of marine life, including the secretive giants of the ocean, manta rays. A team of researchers from Conservation International heads out on an expedition to learn more about the biology, population size and migration patterns of these astonishing animals to protect them from overfishing outside of marine-protected areas.

programme.desc: The team investigate what looks like a haunted house, and discover a terrifying creature that can camouflage itself to any background. programme.title: 30 Years of the PDC World Championships

programme.sub-title: 2004 World Championship: Phil Taylor v Kevin Painter

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: A firm favourite at Brighton and Hove Albion, Yankuba Minteh sits down with PL Stories and opens up on his journey from the streets of The Gambia to the pinnacle of the Premier League. We travel to his hometown to meet his parents and those who first recognised his talent, uncovering the roots of his relentless drive and humility. A story of resilience and rapid ascent, uncovering the challenges hes overcome, and the pride he carries for his home nation.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: I Was a Hitman for Primrose Dairies
programme.desc: Luther `Hobbo Hobdyke, a retired milkman with strong links to MI5, arrives in the village. Very soon, calling upon his experiences on numerous dangerous missions overseas as a master spy, he forms a small team of reluctant volunteers, consisting of Alvin and Entwistle ready to react to any emergency in the village. Finding that Hobbo has moved next door, Clegg and Truly recall that he was never much of a milkman.

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Hyacinth decides that, because it is Christmas, Richard should distribute gifts to the old people at the Church Hall dressed as Santa Claus. When Richard gets incredibly drunk with Emmet, however, Elizabeth decides to take his place in the costume, with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: Captain Mainwaring tries to get out of attending a big church parade when the Home Guard are ordered to wear their medals from previous conflicts. The trouble is, Mainwaring hasnt got any.

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: Alice has worked out the clues in `The Da Vinci Code and concluded, somewhat worryingly, that she is the last living descendant of Jesus Christ. Meanwhile, the Vicar is fed up with rich townies buying weekend cottages in her beloved Dibley - until she meets one of them. Could Harry possibly be her Mr Right? Unlike every other villager hes not insane and has his own teeth.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team travel to the newly restored Stowe House in Buckinghamshire, once one of the grandest houses in the country. Experts uncover treasures amongst the family heirlooms, including a 16th-century print that could be worth tens of thousands of pounds, evidence of one of the earliest Beatles concerts arranged by a schoolboy, and there is a big surprise for one of the team.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to the north of Scotland for a busy day in the grounds of Cawdor Castle near Inverness. Objects under scrutiny include original artwork given in payment for hairdressers bills, the best bargain buy dolls ever seen on the show, and an early 18th-century travelling chest that may once have been owned by Queen Anne.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1969 Morris Mini Cooper MkII is totally restored by specialists. They give it the full works, which means only one thing... any chance of profit heads towards an open window.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team set out on a Pre-War challenge with a 1939 three wheeled Morgan F4 - and aptly named Russ Storer from MG Mecca is still keen to take it on.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: To celebrate its 50th anniversary, the railway has hired headlining steam engine Royal Scot, but she has a problem with her boiler, carriages that havent been serviced in five years, and no-one even knows if she will fit the line.
