programme.desc: Mike and Mefford-the-mechanic are on the hunt for Madame X, a legendary one-of-a-kind 1929 Cadillac. The vintage masterpiece is said to be in a Michigan garage filled with museum-quality Packards.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank follow the signs -- large and small -- to a treasure trove of advertising memorabilia.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien find, fix and flog unwanted possessions. Henry and Simon realise profit potential in an old crop sprayer, a cast iron fire guard and old wooden workshop clamps.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Max McMurdo and Henry Cole visit a motorbike fan. Henry makes table lamps from motorbike engines, while Max turns a pallet and iron wheels into a stylish modern coffee table.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Insp Raymond Fowler and his partner Patricia Dawkins are looking forward to celebrating ten years of togetherness, but the Queens official birthday looks set to upset their plans.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: DI Grim gets to deal with real-life terrorists, Constable Habib falls in love with a handsome fireman, and Constable Goody goes green.

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: Fowlers strategy for the pub quiz is sabotaged from within, when DI Grim tells his star player, WPC Habib, that her feminine wiles are needed to bait a trap.

programme.title: Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: Freds first film brings him a whiff of fame which is not wholly welcome, especially as it interrupts his work on the wreck of a steam tractor. He is further distracted by being taken off on holiday to Blackpool.

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: Fred buys his house, the family go to a steam rally, Alison and the girls go to Greece on holiday and Alison asks Fred for a divorce.

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: Left alone, Fred finds himself pursued by ladies but concentrates on his work.

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: Fred has married again, and he becomes the father of two sons.

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: The final programme in the series documenting the life of Bolton steeplejack Fred Dibnah sees him contemplating his future and the possibility of retirement.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Railway Collection
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah shares his enthusiasm for Britains historic railway workshops, museums and lines. Fred looks at some of Trevithick and Stephensons early engines.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul hits the road to collect an old navy ambulance that served its time as a holiday camper.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave travels to Bedale to extract a barn find - a 1984 Manta GTE which hasnt seen the light of day in thirty years.

programme.title: How Britain Worked
programme.desc: Guy helps the £500,000 restoration of the worlds oldest surviving Brixham sailing trawler, the boat that launched the modern fishing industry and transformed the way a nation ate. He experiences deep sea trawling, said to be the most dangerous job of the 19th century, for himself, and discovers how Britain acquired its taste for fish and chips.

programme.title: How Britain Worked
programme.desc: Guy helps to get the Birmingham Botanical Gardens back into shape, and tries to learn one of the Industrial Revolutions most skilful and dangerous jobs: blowing glass for the gardens enormous greenhouses. He has a go at rebuilding the very first lawnmower: another great British invention. Guy also uses a little-known 19th-century technique to make his own rock.

programme.title: TOTP 2
programme.desc: Mark Radcliffe presents a look back at some of the most memorable `Top of the Pops performances from the 80s including Adam Ant, Kylie and Jason, Culture Club, Bucks Fizz, Yazz, Wham! and Duran Duran.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads north to pick up a 1954 Morgan +4 coupe in mint condition and believed to be just one of three still on the road.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek waxes lyrical about a pristine Jaguar XJ8 and a Ford Model T van tests his driving skills.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek travels to the Yorkshire coast to pick up a 1963 Austin J2 Paralanian campervan, described as the Rolls Royce of campervans.

programme.title: Kapoor and Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: Vishi, a small time crook, looks like AJ, a professional assassin. AJ convinces Vishi to help him fool the mob so he can be with his wife while she has a baby, and as the crooks close in on Vishi, AJ arrives to deal with them.

programme.title: Dheet Patangey
programme.desc: Between the two big wins in 1983 and 2011, four cricket-crazy friends set out to find answers and write their destinies.

programme.desc: Following a group of East Indian immigrants as they cope with life and cultural differences in Melbourne, Australia.
